_comment: Optimized Upwork profile configuration for Bob's ClawWork operation

profile.title: AI Business Analyst & Technical Writer | Smart Home, Real Estate & B2B
profile.tagline: I turn complex business problems into clear, actionable deliverables. Fast delivery, professional quality.

overview.headline: Research | Technical Writing | Bookkeeping | Real Estate | Code Review
overview.bio:
I bring 10+ years of operations, technology, and financial analysis experience to every project. Specializing in smart home technology, real estate support, B2B content, and technical documentation — I deliver polished, accurate, and fast.

Core services:
• Market research & competitive analysis reports
• Technical documentation & API writing
• Real estate listing copy & market reports
• Bookkeeping & financial reporting
• Code review & architecture assessment

Clients describe working with me as: fast, thorough, professional, and detail-oriented. My background spans AV/smart home systems, property technology, software integration, and professional services — which means I bring real domain expertise to your project, not just generic writing skills.

Available 24/7 with response times under 1 hour.

portfolio.title: SaaS Market Competitive Analysis
portfolio.description: 12-page competitive analysis of 5 CRM vendors for a mid-market real estate brokerage. Includes feature comparison matrix, pricing analysis, and recommendation.

portfolio.title: Smart Home API Integration Guide
portfolio.description: Technical documentation for a REST API integration between a smart home hub and third-party devices. Includes endpoint reference, code examples, and error handling guide.

portfolio.title: Phoenix Real Estate Market Report — Q4 2025
portfolio.description: Comprehensive quarterly market report for the Phoenix metro area. Includes median price trends, days-on-market analysis, neighborhood breakdown, and 2026 outlook.

portfolio.title: Small Business P&L Report Package
portfolio.description: Monthly bookkeeping and P&L reporting package for a 10-person professional services firm. Includes bank reconciliation, expense categorization, and formatted P&L statement.

research_report.subject: Proposal: {project_title}
key_customizations: Reference a specific detail from the client's brief
Name the domain (real estate, smart home, SaaS, etc.) explicitly
Keep under 200 words — long proposals lose clients

technical_writing.subject: Technical Writing: {project_title}

phase_1_days_1_30.rationale: Build review count, accept slightly below-optimal rate

phase_3_days_61_plus.rationale: Full rate after Top Rated badge
